name: Phage War
detailed_description:
Have you ever wondered what is inside your body ? How does cells interact each other ? How do you grow up ? Well it's clearly not like in this game...

  • Extend your territory !

    Start from scratch, then grow up, destroy your ennemies and keep your organism alive.
about_the_game:
Have you ever wondered what is inside your body ? How does cells interact each other ? How do you grow up ? Well it's clearly not like in this game...

  • Extend your territory !

    Start from scratch, then grow up, destroy your ennemies and keep your organism alive.
short_description: Start from a simple cell and grow to in order to become the biggest!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 / 8
  • Processor: Any processor with at least 1.0GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any card with at least 128MB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: none

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MAC OS X 10.6.4
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (Double-cœur) frequency : 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 512 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any card with at least 128MB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
